Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a red-brown pottery vessel, the fabric is relatively coarse and grey in section, the interior is ribbed, the exterior is covered with a self-slip, a zone of cream-coloured paint and faint traces of seven lines of black-painted demotic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393882) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393882)
